body: Story 9/10 | Art 9/10 | Character 10/10 | Enjoyment 7/10 | Overall 8,7/10 | Its really funny to see mini inuko tell a dirty story. Its cute. Characters also really on point, like when Aki questioning Akari lewdness meanwhile Nadeshiko just push her to tell the stories. I enjoy this as a normal doujin not hentai doujin, its great to see an alternate timeline when Yuru Camp girls talk about lewd stuff.
@dhfrs all people below the legal are too young
7/10, Aoi is sexy but Akari is too young imo.
Very cute girls, Thank God no ugly bastard
